_logAgain: For security reasons, please log in again
_errorLogin: Incorrect login credentials, or user not registered
_doneResetPassword: We have sent the new password to the phone number
_checkPermission: You have already enabled the necessary permission
_wrongResetPassword: The phone number entered is not registered
_exitCode: Do you really want to exit the registration phase?
_genericError: The request could not be fulfilled due to a generic error
_sosAdmin: The system is currently unavailable, please try again
_pasteCode: You want to paste the string as a code
_serviceText: Sorry, the app is temporarily unavailable. Check your network connection while we troubleshoot, for a correct functioning of the app enable the permission below
_serviceTextIOs: Sorry, the app is temporarily unavailable. Check your network connection while we troubleshoot
_exitSignUp: Are you sure you want to exit the registration?
_emptyTerms: You must read and accept the App Terms and Conditions
_emptyPrivacy: You must read and accept the terms of Privacy and Policy
_errorSignUp: The registration could not be completed, please try again
_emptySeats: Please enter the number of seats
_maxSeats: The max number of seats is
_dateNTimeValid: Please enter a valid booking date and time
_errorBook: The booking could not be completed, please try again
_dateNTimeClose: Reservations for that day and time are closed
_dateNTimeMore: You have selected a booking time previous to the current one
_doneReserv: Your book has been sent successfully. Wait for confirmation from the manager
_newUpdateDialog: A new version of the app is available, update to continue to use it
_deleteRes: Are you sure you want to cancel your reservation?
_closeAppBody: Press the back button again to close the app
_logOutBody: Are you sure you want to log out of your account?
_minOrderDialog: Sorry, but the cart total does not reach the minimum to be able to place the order
_cartDelete: Are you sure you want to remove the item from your cart?
_cartDeleteAll: Are you sure you want to empty the cart?
_locationDisable: Enable location permissions from the mobile phone settings
_errorAddress: Sorry, our systems have verified that the entry is incorrect. Try using the automatic delivery address
_errorAutomaticAddress: Sorry, but the automatic address system is currently unavailable
_sameNumber: The number is the same as the registration number
_deliveryAddressExist: Sorry, but we do not currently deliver to that address
_errorSendOrder: The time you selected is no longer available, please try again with a different one
_enterToGoTime: Please enter a to go time
_orderDayClose: Orders for that day and time are closed
_orderDone: Your order has been sent successfully. Wait for confirmation from the manager
_updatePasswordError: Sorry, your password could not be updated, please try again
_doneEditPassword: Changes to your password have been successfully made
_updateProfileError: Sorry, your profile could not be updated, please try again
_doneEditProfile: Changes to your profile have been successfully made
_deleteOrderError: I'm sorry, but you cannot cancel the order because it has already been processed
_deleteOrder: Are you sure you want to cancel your order?
_deleteNotify: Are you sure you want to cancel the notification?
_deleteAllNotify: Are you sure you want to delete all notifications?
_errorAddCart: The product could not be added to the cart, please try again
_errorIngredient: You must select at least one ingredient to add the item to the cart
_guestLogin: This feature is only available to logged in users. Do you want to login now?
